[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995146][color=#FFFFFF]Official July 2019 Member of the Month is HACKED[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3583467][color=#AA00FF][b]Help Bot[/b][/color][/url]
The user known as HACKED has gained the Member of the Month award.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993892][color=#FFFFFF]News Discord Connecting and Account Security[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Due to an issue with an exploit that allowed access to accounts without any credentials, Omniscient has removed the Discord social login.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993857][color=#FFFFFF]Favorite Nav Item[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has created a poll to find out what your most-used Nav Item is when you are on Hack Forums.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Member Feedback & Testimonials[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993602][color=#FFFFFF]My 10 year story[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=37014][color=#0066FF][b]Dr.BrokenGod[/b][/color][/url]
Dr.BrokenGod Has Made a testimonial about his great experience oh Hack Forum.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5992347][color=#FFFFFF]7 Years on HF, The Worker's testimonial[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1255039][color=#FFFFFF][b]The Worker[/b][/color][/url]
The member The Worker has shared his 7 years so far here at Hack Forums and it's honestly a great little read.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5987563][color=#FFFFFF]6 years of change[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1559430][color=#FFFFFF][b]Nanako-chan[/b][/color][/url]
Nanako-chan Has expressed what they came to Hack Forums for and what they are still doing here to this day.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995181][color=#FFFFFF]NINJA LEAVES TWITCH[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4238993][color=#0066FF][b]DrRespect[/b][/color][/url]
The streamer known as Ninja has officially left twitch to stream on a new platform called Mixer. Twitch have removed his verified badge and it seems that everyone is following him over to the new platform.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5994366][color=#FFFFFF]World 5.3 Billion devices in risk[/color][/url]- [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2479200][color=#FFCC00][b]madam[/b][/color][/url]
The operating system known as VxWorks has been found as vulnerable and it is found to be effective to possibly 2 billion devices maybe even more.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995160][color=#FFFFFF]The Roger Ver Local Bitcoin[/color][/url]- [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Roger Ver has started a local bitcoin outlet with no KYC. Members are unsure if this is going to work out well but only time will tell.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995106][color=#FFFFFF]Community Alert HF is getting E-Whored hard.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1573817][color=#ED1C24][b]Spaark[/b][/color][/url]
Spaark has created a community alert about how it's getting harder to e-whore with real people e-whoring themselves out. The member HackingDoge was also part of this thread and has made it a right laugh.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995011][color=#FFFFFF]Let's hear some positive and inspirational quotes[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][color=#ED1C24][b]Pikachu[/b][/color][/url]
Pikachu is looking for some original quotes that spell out positivity and inspirational to other members.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995379][color=#FFFFFF]This is deep. But made me think.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3525782][color=#FFCC00][b]HF.Psych[/b][/color][/url]
Life changes every single day, no matter what we do it changes all the time but HF.Psych recently began to reminisce about there youth days and has made a very deep thread that makes you think about life.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995262][color=#FFFFFF]3 x PRIZES - Win 1,000 BYTES!![/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1990800][color=#EC7E03][b]Cameron[/b][/color][/url]
Cameron is hosting a giveaway of 3,000 bytes these bytes will be split among three winners. 

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995339][color=#FFFFFF]500 Bytes contest.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3205632][color=#0066FF][b]Plague Doctor[/b][/color][/url]
A member by the name of Plague Doctor has started there first ever giveaway offering one lucky winner 500 bytes.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]Now that we're past the halfway mark of 2019, I thought I'd ask some questions related to this year. To start, what is your favorite album that came out this year?[/size][/i][/color][/align]

[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]What has been the biggest change or impact on your life in 2019?[/size][/i][/color][/align]
  
[align=center][color=#95a7c4][size=small]TOPIC:[/size] [i][size=large]What is your favorite HF feature that was introduced or updated in 2019?[/size][/i][/color][/align]

[align=center][color=#888888][i][size=x-large]Let us know what your opinion is, uncensored and anonymous. [url=https://hfnt.typeform.com/to/dHd2NV]Begin here.[/url][/size][/i][/color][/align]

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=682909][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/businessnews-bear.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Trump's tariff war with China[/color][/b] 
On the latest business skirmishes with China, President Trump has mentioned that things are looking uphill from the current position. He insists that it would not be the consumers from the US that would be footing the bill for the import taxes, although the economists beg to differ. In an abrupt manner, President Trump had slapped a base rate of 10% on the tariffs for the $300 billion imports from China, which ended up stunning the financial markets, and kept many stock markets in a logjam. However, although President Trump sees the deadlock end, China has not planned to cut any prices to account for the tariff increase by the US. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-trade/trump-defends-stance-on-china-trade-after-new-tariffs-idUSKCN1UT0CK]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Disney's report shows status of streaming war[/color][/b] 
Walt Disney Co, along with Viacom and CBS have placed emphasis on the increase in competition in the video streaming arena, which could end up sparking a volatility in the entertainment and communications sector, ever since it was overhauled the preceding year. The quarterly reports from Disney, Viacom and CBS for June has kept the investors wary of the rising competition within the video streaming arena with the stocks of Netflix tanking around 14% since it was last reported in July 2017. There are smaller companies like CBS and Viacom also building subscription based video services, which will take on the behemoths like Netflix and Disney, who is about to launch Disney + to the world. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-stocks-weekahead/disney-report-to-shine-spotlight-on-streaming-war-idUSKCN1US25P]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Exxon Mobil records a sinking quarter[/color][/b] 
Exxon Mobil is looking at a bleak quarterly report with a drop of about 21% in their third period, which is on the back of consecutive results every year. The oil production was also drastically weakened due to the weak refining process, and Exxon Mobil also faced an onslaught in their chemical business. However, what can be considered a bright spot for Exxon was the increase in production from 3.9 million barrels every day to 7% increase. Their competition Shell posted a very small profit in their last 30 months; however, they had a very weak margin in chemicals and a noticeable loss in their refining capacity as well. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-exxon-mobil-results/exxon-mobil-profit-sinks-on-weakness-in-chemicals-refining-idUSKCN1US1E0https://www.reuters.com/article/us-exxon-mobil-results/exxon-mobil-profit-sinks-on-weakness-in-chemicals-refining-idUSKCN1US1E0]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Group of Teens Get Held at Gunpoint on Live PD[/color][/b] 
This group of teens was being held at gunpoint by cops after neighbors had called them in saying they had a gun on them. After they were all apprehended, they found out the gun was just a CO2 gun that looked identical to a real one. The cops ended up letting them go and told them to be careful with that and to keep it inside the house at all times because it could easily be mistaken for a real gun. Thankfully nobody was shot or hurt during the altercation. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FzV3qPTKPlM]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]1917 Movie Official Trailer[/color][/b] 
This new upcoming movie called "1917" looks like it's going to be a war movie set during World War I. The story is about two young British soldiers who are to embark on the mission of their life. They have to deliver a message that would stop a devastating attack on hundreds of soldiers. If they fail this mission, all those soldiers will die. To deliver this message, they have to cross through enemy territory just to get that message delivered. The movie will be out worldwide on January 10th, 2020. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UcmZN0Mbl04]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Idris Elba Wants to Fight While Eating Spicy Wings | Hot Ones[/color][/b] 
One of Hollywood's biggest stars, Idris Elba, is interviewed on Hot Ones. As usual, the show would ask many questions while the person being interviewed eats spicy wings, progressively getting hotter and hotter through the sauces. Idris soon feels the burn, and questions the idea during that entire show, and asks the guy if he can fight, jokingly of course. It's always great to watch peoples reaction on this show when they get to those really hot sauces. Even funnier when they claim that they can handle spicy food. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tYRS0aXaBC8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]


[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Aug 5, 2019 - Aug 11, 2019[/i]
[spoiler]
[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"This is a relaxed week compared to some you’ve been through recently. With a fabulous focus on your sector of leisure and romance, you’re in a peak time for enjoying life and generally having fun. Once this phase is over, you might be eager to get on with your work, but the coming few weeks are the time to let down your hair and indulge in your favorite activities. 

Toward that end, some delectable aspects, particularly on Wednesday and Thursday, could coincide with exciting social events and encounters that are warm and endearing. Going on a first date? Choose one of these days to make a wonderful impression. 

And with jovial Jupiter now turning direct in your travel sector, it’s time to jet off on vacation. If you’ve had to delay your holiday for various reasons, the way is now clear to kick back and enjoy some premium relaxation. 

Finally, you could be something of a party animal this month, so whether you’re solo or spoken for, it’s time to have a ball."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"Positive events may be a turning point for the family, with plenty of activity in your domestic sector encouraging get-togethers and reunions. These likely won’t be quiet affairs, but rather they could be boisterous and a joy to attend. If you enjoy hosting, this is your chance to get your place shipshape and impress your friends and relatives with your wonderful cooking skills and ability to make others feel at home. 

Wednesday and Thursday can be excellent days for a get-together or other big occasion, so make the most of them. It’s also a good time to invite over people you’re eager to know better, because you’ll soon become friends. 

Over the weekend, upbeat Jupiter turns direct after being retrograde for some months, and this can bring positive news regarding a loan, mortgage, or other money you’ve been waiting for. 

Finally, with Uranus turning retrograde in your sign, get ready for a revolution on the inside."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"If you want to sell or promote, this is the time to go ahead. With some wonderful aspects around the midweek mark, you’ll find it easy to persuade people to support your ideas or perhaps buy something from you. With this level of verbal skill at your fingertips, you can make quite an impression this week and over the coming weeks. If you work in the media or advertising, you could do extremely well at this time. 

However, you have an even more magnetic touch on Wednesday and Thursday, when the sun and sweet Venus link with jovial Jupiter. This can be a good time for a party or other social event or for networking if this is important to you. 

And there’s a positive shift at the end of the week when expansive Jupiter turns direct after being retrograde for some time. 

Finally, when electric Uranus turns retrograde on Sunday, it might be time to reinvent your inner game."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"“Money makes the world go ’round,” and it certainly makes your world go ’round this week with a dynamic focus on your financial zone. The only issue being that you might prefer to spend it rather than hold onto it. Unless you make a concerted effort to set a budget and spending limit, there’s a chance you could overdo it. 

This is particularly so midweek when the sun and indulgent Venus link with expansive Jupiter. If you had any plans to save money, they could go right out the window, particularly if you see anything you absolutely must have. Discipline could be in short supply at this time. 

However, when positive Jupiter turns direct in your lifestyle sector this weekend, you may begin to feel more in control of things. And if you’ve put hard work into developing an opportunity, you’ll soon see the rewards."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"This is very much your time, with a dynamic focus on your sign making you the center of attention. Wherever you are and whatever you’re doing, you’ll stand out from the crowd. With sweet Venus, the sun, and feisty Mars in your sign, joined by Mercury on Sunday, your natural leadership qualities may be very much in the fore. At the same time, you can be extremely charming when you need to be.

Single? People may be falling all over themselves to meet you, and you certainly won’t be short of dates. Spoken for? Make use of some sterling midweek aspects to enjoy a special night out with your partner. It could be a heartwarming occasion.

Over the weekend, adventurous Jupiter finally pushes ahead after its retrograde phase to bring progress your way. If a creative project or romantic bond had seemed to stall, things should now pick up. 

Finally, regarding your career, changing your inner game could make all the difference."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"There’s a lot going on behind the scenes, with a potent emphasis on your psychological and spiritual zone. This can be an opportunity to resolve any ongoing issues, especially those that are preventing further progress. It would be best not to initiate new plans or projects at this time, because you’re going through a period when it’s best to tie up loose ends and clean the slate for a fresh start later this month. 

There are some wonderful midweek aspects that may be helpful if you’re celebrating a family occasion, especially one that’s filled with positive emotions. It could be a wedding, birth, or milestone birthday that brings everyone together in a joyful way. 

The weekend brings more positive news as upbeat Jupiter turns direct in your sector of home and family, making this a good time to kick-start key projects. 

Plus, with chatty Mercury moving into Leo midmonth, a little planning and organization can make domestic tasks so much easier."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"You’re certainly going to shine this month with an active focus on your social sector making you the center of attention. This week and coming weeks can be excellent for forging new friendships, finding love, and getting involved in groups and clubs that represent your interests. 

It’s also an opportunity to bring a dream or goal to life, especially if it’s been a long-held wish. You have the support of your friends if needed, and you should find it easy to get a team together to help you if necessary. 

With upbeat Jupiter turning direct on Sunday after being in reverse for some months, it’s time to promote your ideas and network with those who may be eager to get involved. 

Finally, as lively Mercury enters your social zone on Sunday, key conversations can lead to new projects and exciting plans. You may be very busy, but it will be enjoyable."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"This rather pleasant week has much to commend it because positive energies could see you eager to reach out for new opportunities and embrace exciting challenges. 

If you’re prepared to show off and let others know all about your wonderful talents, this is a time when you can go far. It certainly isn’t a time to be modest. 

In addition, jovial Jupiter turns direct in your personal money zone over the weekend, and this could see an improvement in cash flow and finances in general. If you’ve experienced delays over past months, this should gradually come to an end. 

Finally, chatty Mercury moves into Leo and your sector of goals on Sunday, and this is further encouragement from the cosmos to relish the spotlight. When you let your charismatic persona shine, others really notice you. This isn’t the time to hold back."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"This can be a fabulous week in which you welcome all kinds of opportunities and challenges. With two sterling aspects on Wednesday and Thursday as the sun and luscious Venus link with upbeat Jupiter, you may receive an offer that you simply can’t refuse. If you take it up, you’re certain to enjoy it. 

There is more good news this week as jovial Jupiter in your sign turns direct, which could see you reaping the rewards of all your hard work. If you’ve been planning to travel or take on a new project, this is the time to go ahead because you’ll feel renewed confidence. 

Articulate Mercury moves into your travel sector on Sunday, joining other planets and encouraging you to move out of your comfort zone and do some exploring. You’re in your element when you’re confronting the unknown, so relish those bold moves and see where they take you."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"This month could see a more intense phase for the first three weeks, which might be a call to release blocked emotions. Typically, these can be associated with situations that have been a sticking point for months, if not years. The more you contemplate them, the more you prefer to turn your back and pretend they aren’t there. 

However, this dynamic focus can coincide with a push to take action. If you feel you’d like to visit a therapist or counselor, this is very much the time to do so. The input could help you locate any blind spots and release blocks to your success. 

In addition, with expansive Jupiter pushing forward in a more spiritual zone, you may now see the rewards in your life that have resulted from any meditation and reflection you’ve done. 

The focus is very much on the inner game, and finding someone who can help you play it well might make all the difference."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"Your relationship sector is buzzing, and you could be busy with all kinds of interactions ranging from the most romantic to the most businesslike. Your social life will also have plenty of sizzle, and you could find yourself on the receiving end of a lot of invitations. Be choosy. You really can have too much of a good thing. 

Expansive Jupiter pushes ahead in your sector of relating over the weekend, which could be the start of a new phase in your social life. If you’ve been eager to connect with more adventurous people, your efforts to do so may now bring positive rewards. 

Uranus, your guide planet, also turns retrograde in your home zone on Sunday, which could see you slowing down the pace of change. For instance, if you were thinking of moving, it might be wise not to rush into anything too quickly."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"Aug 5, 2019 - Aug 11, 2019 - Ready to get toned and feel fabulous? With a sterling lineup in your wellness sector, there is much you can do to enhance your overall level of fitness. And if you’re really determined, you could be a guiding light for friends who are also eager to get in shape. 

At the same time, this can be a positive week for work or business-related plans because you could net one or two fabulous opportunities that help to increase your income. This might be a good time to advertise and promote yourself in general because good things could come from doing so. 

In addition, with positive Jupiter turning direct in your sector of goals and ambitions, the coming weeks can bring fresh developments and a sense that progress is now possible. You may soon be flying high. 

Do you have something to sell? You can be very persuasive when necessary this week, and if you need to convince someone of an idea, you could be a force to be reckoned with."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list][/spoiler]
[b][color=#ccffff]This Week's Featured Inspirational/Philosophical Video[/color][/b]
[spoiler][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qOZqGUCrje8[/yt][/spoiler]
[b][color=#ccffff]Inspirational Quote[/color][/b]
[i]"Always be yourself and never change who you are in order to impress somebody else. Don't be someone you're not, and never give up on your goals and dreams. Life will always be filled with new obstacles and challenges that we as human beings have to overcome, don't let these bumps in the road lead to your downfall, you are all strong enough to fulfill your own dreams and desires, as long as you continue on the right path which you have chosen to take."[/i] -[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][color=#ED1C24]Pikachu[/color][/url]
